entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 08 January 2023
